data.actual_result: The option shows the "Select..." filler text:
data.expected_result: The option you clicked on should show up as selected in the box.
data.short_description: Selecting options to customize an invite's duration or number of usages cannot be selected.
data.steps_to_repro: - Have permission to create an invite for the server (either through administrator or create invite permission). - Click the gear to customize options. - Select an option from "expire after" or "max number of uses". - Observe that the options render the box with faded-out (deselected) gray filler text that says "Select...", as if nothing was selected.
